<small>Also see: [[H6887]]</small>

 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרַר‎</span> **verb** ==bind, tie up, be restricted, narrow, scant, cramped== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bind, tie up***; so Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎צְרַר‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**A.** transitive: **Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרַר‎</span> [[Hos.4.19|Hos 4:19]]; [[Prov.30.4|Prov 30:4]] ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוֺר‎</span> [[Isa.8.16|Isa 8:16]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְרוֺר‎</span> [[Prov.26.8|Prov 26:8]] (?); ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹרֵר‎</span> [[Job.26.8|Job 26:8]] ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרוּר‎</span> [[Hos.13.12|Hos 13:12]], feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְרוּרָה‎</span> [[1Sam.25.29|1Sam 25:29]] feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְרֻרֹת‎</span> [[Exod.12.34|Exod 12:34]]; [[2Sam.20.3|2Sam 20:3]] — ***bind*** or ***tie up***, of kneading-troughs [[Exod.12.34|Exod 12:34]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); figurative of a life preserved by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶפֶשׁ צְרוּרָה בִּצְרוֺר הַחַיִּים‎</span> [[1Sam.25.29|1Sam 25:29]] of preserving prophetic teaching [[Isa.8.16|Isa 8:16]] of retention of guilt [[Hos.13.12|Hos 13:12]] of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s ***binding*** waters in (a garment of) cloud [[Prov.30.4|Prov 30:4]]; [[Job.26.8|Job 26:8]] = ***shut up*** [[2Sam.20.3|2Sam 20:3]] — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרַר רוּחַ אֹתָהּ בִּכְנָפֶיהָ‎</span> [[Hos.4.19|Hos 4:19]] (si vera lectio) pregnantly, ***the wind hath wrapped her up in its wings***, to carry her off; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּצְרוֺר אֶבֶן‎</span> [[Prov.26.8|Prov 26:8]] ***like the tying up of a stone***, but unintellig. in context (see Toy). **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצֹרָרִים‎</span> [[Josh.9.4|Josh 9:4]] ***tied up*** (mended by tying), of old wine-skins. **B.** intransitive: **Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָ֫רָה‎</span> [[Isa.28.20|Isa 28:20]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵצַר‎</span> [[Prov.4.12|Prov 4:12]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵ֫צֶר לוֺ‎</span> [[Job.20.22|Job 20:22]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַ֫יֵּצֶד‎</span> [[Gen.32.8|Gen 32:8]] +, etc.; — ***be scant, cramped, in straits***; of scanty bed-covering [[Isa.28.20|Isa 28:20]] (in figurative); of land too small for (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>) its people [[Isa.49.19|Isa 49:19]] + [[Josh.19.47|Josh 19:47]] (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֵּצֵא‎</span>) [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>Expos. Jan. 1887, 59</sup> [[BDB#Benn|Benn]], compare [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]; of steps = ***be cramped***, or impeded, [[Prov.4.12|Prov 4:12]]; [[Job.18.7|Job 18:7]] (both in figure); especially impersonal with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֵּצֶר לוֺ‎</span> [[Gen.32.8|Gen 32:8]] ***and it was narrow for him*** = he was in straits, distress, so [[Judg.2.15|Judg 2:15]]; [[2Sam.13.2|2Sam 13:2]]; [[Job.20.22|Job 20:22]], also 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתֵּ֫צֶר לְ‎</span> [[Judg.10.9|Judg 10:9]]; [[1Sam.30.6|1Sam 30:6]] (see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהֵצַר‎</span> [[Deut.28.52|Deut 28:52]] (twice in verse) consecutive; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַהֲצֵרֹתִי‎</span> [[Jer.10.18|Jer 10:18]]; [[Zeph.1.17|Zeph 1:17]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָצַרלֿוֺ‎</span> [[1Kgs.8.37|1Kgs 8:37]] = [[2Chr.6.28|2Chr 6:28]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫צַד‎</span> [[2Chr.28.20|2Chr 28:20]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּצֵרוּ‎</span> [[Neh.9.27|Neh 9:27]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָצֵר‎</span> [[2Chr.28.22|2Chr 28:22]]; [[2Chr.33.12|2Chr 33:12]] — ***make narrow*** for, ***press hard*** upon, ***cause distress*** to, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person, [[Jer.10.18|Jer 10:18]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), [[Zeph.1.17|Zeph 1:17]] (subject ***id.***); [[Deut.28.52|Deut 28:52]] (twice in verse); [[1Kgs.8.37|1Kgs 8:37]] = [[2Chr.6.28|2Chr 6:28]]; [[Neh.9.27|Neh 9:27]] (all subject foe), [[2Chr.28.20|2Chr 28:20]] (subject Tiglath-pileser); indefinite subject [[2Chr.28.22|2Chr 28:22]] (but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּי אִם לְצָרָה לוֺ‎</span>, and join to v[[2Chr.28.21|2Chr 28:21]], opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְעֶזְרָה לוֺ‎</span>, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex</sup>), [[2Chr.33.12|2Chr 33:12]].
